summary: Completed comprehensive testing after backend refactoring. Found and fixed critical dashboard API endpoint mismatch. All 33 backend tests passed. Frontend working correctly after fix.

ui_bugs.issue: Backyard Garden image shows alt text 'Backyard Garden' instead of actual image on projects page

integration_issues.issue: FIXED - Frontend was calling /api/dashboard/today but backend endpoint is /api/dashboard/data
FIXED - Frontend expected startup_tasks/shutdown_tasks but backend returns incomplete_startup_tasks/incomplete_shutdown_tasks

passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint returns healthy status
Backend: Login with admin credentials returns token and user data
Backend: Login with invalid credentials returns 401
Backend: Login with non-existent user returns 401
Backend: GET /api/auth/me returns current user when authenticated
Backend: GET /api/dashboard/data returns dashboard data with tasks and routines
Backend: GET /api/dashboard/all-tasks returns all tasks across projects
Backend: DELETE /api/projects/{id} deletes project and related data
Frontend: Landing page loads without watermark
Frontend: Login flow works with admin credentials
Frontend: Dashboard displays Start of Day, End of Day, Today's Tasks, Your Projects sections
Frontend: Projects page shows all user projects with search and sort
Frontend: Calendar page displays monthly view with tasks
Frontend: Public projects section shows public projects with search
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard endpoint mismatch was caused by refactoring - frontend was not updated to match new backend route structure
Response field names also changed during refactoring (startup_tasks -> incomplete_startup_tasks)
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Project_Fixture for testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend refactoring from monolithic server.py to modular routes/ structure is complete and working. Dashboard endpoint was fixed from /api/dashboard/today to /api/dashboard/data. All CRUD operations for Projects, Diary, Blog, Tasks, and Routines are working. Public endpoints working. No watermark visible on the app.
